title: Swiftwater
description: "FIGHT!"Bucky Calloway can't take Whit's cruelty any more. Like a shot, his fist crashes into Whit's jaw. The fight is on — and Whit Turner gets the beating of his life.But a year later the two boys fight again — and Whit has spent the whole winter building up his muscles. Can Bucky still beat him?Rugged outdoor adventure in the Maine woods, where a boy is not a man until he can say, "Nothing can scare me again."
author: Paul Annixter
